state.ready: A new game can be started.
state.quit: A player has quit the game.
state.disconnected: A player has lost the connection

confirm.quit: Do you really want to leave the game?
confirm.playerLeft: Your opponent has left the game. Do you want to quit the game?

description.lineOne: The goal of the game is to place 4 stones in a row horizontally, vertically or diagonally.
description.lineTwo: The player who is on the move can drop a stone by clicking in any column.
description.lineFour: The game ends as soon as a player has 4 stones in a row.
description.lineFive: The game ends in a draw if all fields are occupied and no player has 4 stones in a row.

levelOne.title: Level 1
levelOne.text: Game according to the normal rules of the game.

levelTwo.title: Level 2
levelTwo.text: 5 seconds are available for one move. If no stone is placed within this time, it will be inserted at a random position.

levelThree.title: Level 3
levelThree.text: After 5 moves a neutral stone is inserted at a random position.

chat.receiverShouldNotBeSetOnPublicMessage: Receiver should not be set on public message

game.cannotWrite: Game board could not be saved
game.invalidPlayer: The current user is not part of this game.
